title: Out of the Fire
description: Ann Covington is on top of the world. Not only is she a prominent attorney and lesbian romance writer, but she’s just learned that one of her books is going to be made into a movie. Now she can even add ‘screenwriter’ to her resume.Life is about to change for Ann–especially when Casey Duncan, the actress who is going to play the lead in Ann’s movie, strolls into her life.Ann and her partner of ten years have certainly been having a tough time of late…but will Casey’s presence turn their world upside down?
author: Beth  Moore
